alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 7:55AM MDT until April 02 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin, Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, East Platte County and Central Carbon County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 12 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
